text: Suraj Alao Abdurrahman (9 September 1954 - 28 January 2015) was a Nigerian architect, engineer officer of the Nigerian Army. He served as Command Officer in Charge of the Armed Forces of Liberia (AFL) in Liberia. He was married and had four children. Abdurrahman died of an illness in a hospital in New York, United States, aged 60. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Architects Category:Disease-related deaths in New York (state) Category:Nigerian generals
title: Suraj Abdurrahman
